column4: hi, does anyone know the default music player that comes built in ubuntu 9.10?
Rhythmbox, as with all previous releases.
when it searches for mp3 and wma it doesn't find no codecs this is normal?
is there anyway for me to add music shortcuts to this player?
in other player i could add music shortcuts, because i have 80gb of music, so it was added rapidly, this rhythmbox appears to take a long long time
